data.name: Base
data.value: Base

data.name: BaseChecked
data.value: Base checked

data.name: BaseCheckedDescription
data.value: The base was loaded correctly.

data.name: BaseDescription
data.value: Base game currently loaded.

data.name: BaseError
data.value: Base error

data.name: N64BaseErrorDescription
data.value: The base did not load. Use one of the N64 games released for the Wii U VC.

data.name: BaseInvalid
data.value: The base is invalid.

data.name: NESBaseSelect
data.value: Select the game folder of the Wii U NES VC that you want to use as base.

data.name: ChooseN64ConfigFile
data.value: Choose N64 configuration file

data.name: ChooseN64ConfigFileDescription
data.value: Select the ".ini" file that contains configuration data for the game you want to inject.

data.name: ChooseROM
data.value: Choose ROM

data.name: ChooseROMDescription
data.value: Select the ROM file of the game you want to inject.

data.name: N64ConfigFile
data.value: N64 configuration file

data.name: N64ConfigFileDescription
data.value: ".Ini" file that contains configuration data for the game you want to inject. Not all games have their corresponding configuration file. You can try leaving it empty.

data.name: N64ConfigFileInvalid
data.value: The N64 configuration file is invalid. An empty file will be injected.

data.name: DarkFilter
data.value: Dark filter

data.name: DarkFilterDescription
data.value: Enable or disable the dark filter in the game display.

data.name: EnableInjecting
data.value: To enable the buttons in the Injecting section you have to choose a ROM, put a name and load a base.

data.name: FolderResultSelect
data.value: Select the folder where the injection result will be saved.

data.name: GamePad
data.value: GamePad

data.name: GamePadDescription
data.value: Change the image that will appear on the GamePad when the game starts.

data.name: GamePadPreview
data.value: GamePad preview

data.name: GamePadPreviewDescription
data.value: Preview the image that will appear in the GamePad when the game starts.

data.name: HelpBox
data.value: Help

data.name: HelpDescription
data.value: Enable or disable this help box.

data.name: Icon
data.value: Icon

data.name: IconDescription
data.value: Change the icon that will appear in the console menu.

data.name: IconPreview
data.value: Icon preview

data.name: IconPreviewDescription
data.value: Preview the image that will appear in the console menu.

data.name: InjectionFailed
data.value: The injection failed.

data.name: InjectionSuccessfully
data.value: The injection was completed successfully!

data.name: InjectionWarningWiiUCK
data.value: Warning! If you use this option, you will receive a failed injection. Enter the Wii U common key (see Settings section).

data.name: CDecryptWarning
data.value: Warning! "resources\unpack\CDecrypt.exe" not found! CDecrypt allows you to unpack (decrypt) Wii U VC games to use as base.

data.name: LoadBase
data.value: Load base

data.name: LoadBaseDescription
data.value: Change the current base game.

data.name: LoadBaseWarningWiiUCK
data.value: Warning! You will not be able to load a packed base (WUP format). Enter the Wii U common key (see Settings section).

data.name: Loading
data.value: Loading...

data.name: Log
data.value: Log

data.name: LogDescription
data.value: Once an injection is made, it shows the contents of the program log file.

data.name: LongName
data.value: Long name

data.name: LongNameBoxesDescription
data.value: Name of two lines that will appear in the console menu and in the template images (see the Images section).

data.name: LongNameDescription
data.value: Enable or disable the long name.

data.name: NotPack
data.value: Not pack

data.name: NotPackDescription
data.value: Perform the injection and copy the result in the path you select. For loadiine.

data.name: CNUSPackerWarning
data.value: Warning! "resources\pack\CNUSPACKER.exe" not found! CNUSPacker allows you to pack (encrypt) the result for WUP Installer.

data.name: Pack
data.value: Pack

data.name: PackDescription
data.value: Perform the injection and pack the result in the path you select. For WUP Installer.

data.name: Injecting
data.value: Injecting

data.name: Players
data.value: Players

data.name: PlayersDescription
data.value: Number of game players that will appear in the template images.

data.name: ProductCode
data.value: Product code

data.name: ProductCodeDescription
data.value: Internal value of the ROM file that identifies the game.

data.name: ReleaseDate
data.value: Release date

data.name: ReleaseDateDescription
data.value: Enable or disable the display of the game release date in the template images.

data.name: ROM
data.value: ROM

data.name: ROMDescription
data.value: The ROM file of the game you want to inject.

data.name: ShortName
data.value: Short name

data.name: ShortNameDescription
data.value: If the long name is not enabled, the short name will be used for all menus in the console and in the template images (see the Images section).

data.name: ShowName
data.value: Show name

data.name: ShowNameDescription
data.value: Enable or disable the display of the name of the game in the template images.

data.name: TitleID
data.value: Title ID

data.name: TitleIDDescription
data.value: Value that identifies the game within the console.

data.name: TitleScreen
data.value: Title screen

data.name: TitleScreenDescription
data.value: Select an image to represent the game in the template images.

data.name: TV
data.value: TV

data.name: TVDescription
data.value: Change the image that will appear on the TV when the game starts.

data.name: TVPreview
data.value: TV preview

data.name: TVPreviewDescription
data.value: Preview the image that will appear on TV when the game starts.

data.name: Warning
data.value: Warning!

data.name: Widescreen
data.value: Widescreen

data.name: WidescreenDescription
data.value: Enable or disable the wide screen in the game display. This modifies the aspect ratio of the game from 4:3 to 16:9.

data.name: WiiUCommonKey
data.value: Wii U Common Key

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyBoxDescription
data.value: Put the Wii U Common Key here, if the key is correct this text box will disable and a green check mark will appear next to it.

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyChecked
data.value: Wii U common key checked

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyCheckedDescription
data.value: The common key was loaded correctly.

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyDescription
data.value: Common key to pack or unpack Wii U games.

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyError
data.value: Wii U common key error

data.name: WiiUCommonKeyErrorDescription
data.value: The common key was not found. Without it you will not be able to decrypt the Wii U games to use as a base or encrypt the result for WUP Installer. (Search it on Google).

data.name: Zoom
data.value: Zoom

data.name: ZoomDescription
data.value: Enlarge or reduce the viewing area of the game. If you expand it a lot I could crop the image of the game.

data.name: SNESBaseSelect
data.value: Select the game folder of the Wii U SNES VC that you want to use as base.

data.name: N64BaseSelect
data.value: Select the game folder of the Wii U N64 VC that you want to use as base.

data.name: GBABaseSelect
data.value: Select the game folder of the Wii U GBA VC that you want to use as base.

data.name: NDSBaseSelect
data.value: Select the game folder of the Wii U NDS VC that you want to use as base.

data.name: NESBaseErrorDescription
data.value: The base did not load. Use one of the NES games released for the Wii U VC.

data.name: SNESBaseErrorDescription
data.value: The base did not load. Use one of the SNES games released for the Wii U VC.

data.name: GBABaseErrorDescription
data.value: The base did not load. Use one of the GBA games released for the Wii U VC.

data.name: NDSBaseErrorDescription
data.value: The base did not load. Use one of the NDS games released for the Wii U VC.

data.name: ModeSelect
data.value: Mode select

data.name: ModeSelectDescription
data.value: Select the application mode. "Auto" allows you to select any compatible ROM and adapts the application automatically. Or select the specific console to have the template images and limit the selection of ROMs according to the console.

data.name: VirtualConsoleTarget
data.value: Virtual Console target

data.name: ROMSizeDescription
data.value: Use this information to determine if you can inject the ROM into the loaded base. At the moment you can only inject ROMs of the same or smaller size to which the base ROM size indicates.

data.name: ROMSize
data.value: ROM size

data.name: AspectRatio
data.value: Aspect ratio

data.name: AspectRatioDescription
data.value: Choose the aspect ratio you prefer to view the game on both TV and GamePad.

data.name: EditN64ConfigFile
data.value: Edit N64 configuration file

data.name: EditN64ConfigFileDescription
data.value: Create or modify the ".ini" configuration file for the N64 game you want to inject. Unfortunately there is not much information about what each option does. (Recommended for advanced users only).

data.name: KeepMenuIcon
data.value: Keep menu icon

data.name: KeepMenuIconDescription
data.value: By selecting this option, the menu icon will remain unchanged. Useful if you just want to edit some virtual console settings without altering anything else.

data.name: KeepImageTV
data.value: Keep image for TV

data.name: KeepImageTVDescription
data.value: By selecting this option, the image for TV will remain unchanged. Useful if you just want to edit some virtual console settings without altering anything else.

data.name: KeepImageGamePad
data.value: Keep image for GamePad

data.name: KeepImageGamePadDescription
data.value: By selecting this option, the image for GamePad will remain unchanged. Useful if you just want to edit some virtual console settings without altering anything else.

data.name: UseNDSIcon
data.value: Use NDS icon

data.name: UseNDSIconDescription
data.value: Instead of a title screen image you can use the NDS game icon.

data.name: NDSIconPreview
data.value: NDS icon preview

data.name: NDSIconPreviewDescription
data.value: Displays the icon that was extracted from the NDS game ROM.

data.name: NDSIconBackground
data.value: NDS icon background

data.name: NDSIconBackgroundDescription
data.value: Some icons do not look good with a black background; you can change it to the color you prefer.
